summary: Use web technologies to develop, test and administer data collection instruments for online and telephone quantitative research projects. Code, clean and de-identify data using statistical packages such as SPSS.
Manage a number of ongoing research project for tracking economic indices and key customer service metrics such as net promoter score.

Elastotech is a manufacturer of a variety of rubber and ceramic based mining products. During my time there I have worked in general production, equipment maintenance, and system planning and improvement. This has often involved working with a flexible timetable and with tight deadlines.

During my electrical apprenticeship I worked in industrial and commercial electrical, lighting, data and communications, security systems and CCTV. I was also required to engage with clients and other trades as well as collect data, as projects progressed
